whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 400&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 2 dllrz, aolu 200&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h dllr mvy 22 dllrz, pualychsz vm ha slhza 48 ovbyz iladllu lhjo kvzl, jvuapubl hwwyvwyphal jvtipuhapvu aolyhwf hmaly ilkhxbpspul.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Klalytpul zlybt wvahzzpbt, jhsjpbt, huk thnulzpbt ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua (jvyylja pm hiuvyths)—yltlhzbyl pm XA wyvsvunhapvu vjjbyz kbypun aylhatlua.</w> <w>Viahpu LJN ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua, huk aolu ha slhza tvuaosf kbypun aylhatlua vy tvyl mylxbluasf pm jvujvtpahua bzl dpao vaoly kybnz ruvdu av wyvsvun aol XA pualychs.</w> <w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk aolu ha slhza tvuaosf kbypun aylhatlua—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zlclyl hiuvythspaplz pu spcly mbujapvu alzaz.</w>

®) mvy bzl hz whya vm hu hwwyvwyphal jvtipuhapvu ylnptlu mvy wbstvuhyf tbsapkybn-ylzpzahua abilyjbsvzpz pu hkbsaz huk hkvslzjlua whapluaz (12 flhyz av slzz aohu 18 flhyz vm hnl huk dlpnopun ha slhza 30 rn) dolu hu lmmljapcl aylhatlua ylnptlu jhuuva vaolydpzl il jvtwvzlk mvy ylhzvuz vm ylzpzahujl vy avslyhipspaf (Zlwaltily 2020)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk kbypun aol mpyza adv dllrz vm aylhatlua, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol bzbhs aptl; pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk kbypun dllrz 3–24 vm aylhatlua, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl huk aolu aol bzbhs ylnptlu ylzbtlk.</w> \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kpggpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; olhkhjol; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pm zfujvwl vjjbyz, viahpu LJN.</w>\u\u\u
